name: Kidney Transplant
content: The Kidney Transplant team at ST Medical is among the most experienced and skilled in BD. Our Transplant Specialists work together to perform Complex Transplant cases

name: Heart Transplant
content: There is nothing more complex than doing Transplants, and for that reason, we work with a team of medical professionals that are veterans in the field of Heart Transplants.

name: Cardiac Surgery
content: Our teams of Heart Specialists are highly skilled and experienced in Adult Cardiac Surgeries.

name: Spine Surgery
content: Our dedicated and highly experienced team of Spine Surgeons is equipped to handle Complex Spinal Surgeries.

name: Radiology
content: Our Department of Radiology offers various and latest Diagnostic Examinations and Interventional Procedures with State-of-the-Art technology.

name: Breast Cancer
content: Our team of Oncologists specialise in Conservative Breast Surgery, Oncoplastic Surgery and Breast Reconstructive Surgery.

name: Liver Transplant & HPB Surgery
content: ST Medical has a multidisciplinary team of super-specialists who are experienced in treating patients with the End-Stage Liver Disease.

name: Dental Sciences
content: We have a team of specialists in every field of Dentistry, Orthodontics, Periodontics, Prosthodontics, and Endodontics.

name: Cardiology
content: Experience the best service backed by world-class Cardiologists at ST Medical

name: Plastic Surgery
content: Our Plastic Surgery Department provides the Latest and Safest Techniques. Our team of expert surgeons have extensive experience in performing various Cosmetic Procedures.
